headline: Is Now the Right Time to Reassess Uber After Shares Drop 11% This Month?
summary: Wondering if Uber Technologies is still a worthwhile investment or if the stock’s run might be hitting turbulence? You’re definitely not alone. There’s a lot to unpack about its true value. While Uber’s shares are up an impressive 201.5% over the last three years, the stock recently pulled back, sliding 9.1% in the past week and 11.0% over the past month. It’s still up 32.5% year to date. This decline comes as investors digest big announcements, including Uber’s entry...
